projects.name: Movie Ranker
projects.description: An application that allows users to rank and see their top movies. Using an API such as the one below may be of help.

projects.name: Inspire Me
projects.description: An application that allows users to create their own inspirational quotes image. Using one of the free stock image services outlined belwo may help you get started.

projects.name: Gist Clone
projects.description: An application that allows users to create page content using markdown in a manner similar to Gist. See the link before for more details.

projects.name: College Scoreboard
projects.description: An application that allows users to view the top ranked colleges within a geographical area. Incorporate a map API like the one below for an extra challenge.

projects.name: Petfinder Application
projects.description: An application that allows users to access data from the PetFinder API (shown below).

projects.name: Weather Logger
projects.description: An application that allows users to log the current weather, as well as view historical data.

projects.name: OAuth Login
projects.description: Create a user flow using OAuth 2.0. This could be helpful with reuse in future projects requiring authentication.

projects.name: My CRUD Site
projects.description: An application that allows users to use each of the four CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete).

projects.name: Editor Portal
projects.description: An application that allows users to submit work for review or feedback, in the vein of an author/journalist to their editor.

projects.name: Blog
projects.description: An application that allows users to add blog posts to a page where they are publicly available. Use a third party CMS for an additional challenge.

projects.name: Pinterest Clone
projects.description: An application that operates as a clone of Pinterest.

projects.name: Restaurant Application
projects.description: An application that allows users to handle basic restaurant operations. Table booking and remote ordering as just two possible functions your app can include.

projects.name: School Management System
projects.description: An application that allows users to handle different aspects of school management. Class structures; financial management and resource allocation are all ideas you can include.

projects.name: Project Management Tool
projects.description: An application that allows users to handle different aspects of project management. This could be designed with a developer end user in mind, or something completely different.

projects.name: Musical Chat
projects.description: An application that allows users to chat with other people who share their musical tastes. Try incorporating the Spotify API for an extra challenge.

projects.name: Pricing Component
projects.description: A design implementation challenge based off the pricing component linked below. Try using flexbox in your project and implement responsive design.

projects.name: Landing Page Design
projects.description: A design implementation challenge from FrontendMentor.io. Navigate to the link below and take the challenge for free.

projects.name: Web Crawler Application
projects.description: An application that can crawl the web for the purpose of web indexing or gathering data.
